member.name: T:MatlabNative.SampleClass
member.summary:
The SampleClass class provides a CLS compliant, Object (native) interface to the M-functions contained in the files:
D:\Users\Rajaraman\Projects\miscellaneous\csharp-matlab-integration-sample\Matlab\ba rChart.m
D:\Users\Rajaraman\Projects\miscellaneous\csharp-matlab-integration-sample\Matlab\ma keSquare.m
D:\Users\Rajaraman\Projects\miscellaneous\csharp-matlab-integration-sample\Matlab\pa rabolaGraph.m
deployprint.m
printdlg.m

member.name: M:MatlabNative.SampleClass.barChart(System.Int32,System.Object[]@,System.Object[],System.Object[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the barChart function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of Objects.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return
Array of Object representing variable input arguments

member.name: M:MatlabNative.SampleClass.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
